name: Dalva "les esprits de la foret"
description:
Welcome to the lost world of Hölme.

Take part in the century old war facing the corruption of Yshaal the old calamity against the guardians of the blessed tree Fyfynh. 

 Fight to repel the waves of corrupted beings from infecting the tree of life. To succeed in your task, you will control one of two guardians, Thimgor and Riaddaf, and take advantage of the antique stones left by your kind. 

 Don’t forget to upgrade your weapons and take arms against legion of enemies, their number growing by the minute. (ton plus bas)

The entirety of Holme is in danger, will you answer the call and protect your home ?

The team : Ehrhardt Joanna, Gerard Maxime, Gonçalves Joris, Martin Théo, Rogron Liam, Schumacker Dylan
